meanings.definition: Enzymes that catalyze the degradation of RNA molecules.
meanings.sent1: Ribonucleases help break down RNA in cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use ribonucleases to study RNA degradation.
meanings.sent3: The ribonucleases at the RNA party were the life of the cell!
meanings.sent4: Her sharp wit cut through conversations like ribonucleases through RNA.
meanings.sent5: The classroom buzzed with the efficiency of ribonucleases breaking down RNA.

meanings.definition: Proteins that cleave the phosphodiester bonds in RNA.
meanings.sent1: Ribonucleases are like tiny scissors cutting RNA bonds.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying how ribonucleases break RNA bonds.
meanings.sent3: The ribonucleases in the cell were on a mission to cut all the RNA bonds!
meanings.sent4: His words acted as ribonucleases, severing the bonds of trust between them.
meanings.sent5: The ribonucleases worked tirelessly, snipping away at the RNA bonds.

meanings.definition: Biological molecules that break down ribonucleic acid.
meanings.sent1: Ribonucleases are essential for the breakdown of RNA in cells.
meanings.sent2: The body produces ribonucleases to degrade ribonucleic acid.
meanings.sent3: The ribonucleases in the stomach had a feast breaking down RNA!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like ribonucleases, slowly breaking down barriers.
meanings.sent5: The ribonucleases worked silently, dismantling the ribonucleic acid.
